integration.name: Google Fonts

constraints.constraint: All components MUST be functional components with TypeScript, use arrow function syntax, destructure props, and export as named exports (not default).
Components: PascalCase (TaskCard.tsx). Hooks: camelCase with use prefix (useTasks.ts). Constants: SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE.
No backend - client-only SPA with localStorage. Zero operational cost, no authentication complexity.
Bundle targets: Total JS less than 100KB gzipped, CSS less than 20KB gzipped. Initial load under 2s on 3G.
Use latest stable dependency versions. Run npm audit. Standard Vite CSP with Google Fonts allowed.
